review: Waited a long time for delivery. Works ok. Causing a problem with Netflix. All movies streamed now on Netflix will not fit full screen and it affects both my television. I stream both amazon and Netflix on a Nintendo Wii. Worked really great until I set up the Fire TV Stick. Now Netflix movies will not play full screen on either TV.
author: cw3delia

review: Just hooked it up with a friends help.  Have not used it yet.
author: Joanne W. Casterline

review: Very easy set up easy to use.not hard to nabagate . I would recommend this item
author: Kevin Angelo

review: This Fire stick is perfect. Ease of use is unbelievable. Ranks up top of list, since I cut the cord.
author: Jackie Bunker

review: Fire stick instructions were very easy to follow. The options available make viewing television more interesting.
author: Matheson Bayley
